JOB DESCRIPTION: About Jai Kisan: Jai Kisan is building the first rural fintech full-stack platform to cater to the financial needs of  borrowers in rural emerging markets. Today, Jai Kisan facilitates secured and income generating  loans to rural borrowers in India, mostly farmers (more than 70% of rural India depends on  agriculture as their primary source of livelihood) from various lending institutions through its mobile  and web-based platform. The platform comprises a user-friendly loan application tool utilizing a  credit scoring engine of 200+ parameters for its farmers, a customizable loan origination and  management system for its lenders and a full-stack CRM solution for its channel partners. The  mobile and web interface is available at borrowers fingertips or at any of Jai Kisans technologically enabled channel partner locations. Technologies: Nodejs (with Express JS), Angular, MongoDB, MySQL, Rest APIs, Lambda CI/CD Primary technology skill set  Rest APIs, MongoDB, MySQL, Lambda, CI/CD, NodeJS  (ExpressJS) Secondary technology skill set  Understanding of Configured Driven Development, Google  Developer (GDGs), Top coder, Github, Stack overflow. Responsibilities  Should be involved to drive product & design discussions   Should be working with the front facing partner API integrations   Should be able to build public facing customer on-boarding portals   Should be able to deliver reliable solutions that handle massive data & high traffic. Interested Candidates share your resume at hr@jai-kisan.com
